Sharifabad Agriculture and Industry Organization () is a village in Sharifabad Rural District  (Approval date) 1370/03/08 (Iranian Jalali calendar) |date=29 May 1991  |script-title=fa:انجام اصلاحاتی در دهستانهای استان زنجان |trans-title=‌Implementing reforms in rural districts of Zanjan province |url=https://lamtakam.com/law/council_of_ministers/113583 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20241211194519/https://lamtakam.com/law/council_of_ministers/113583 |archive-date=11 December 2024 |access-date=25 June 2025 |website= [Lam ta Kam] |publisher= [Ministry of the Interior] |agency= [Political Defense Commission of the Government Board] |language=fa |id= [ID] B48072DC-8169-4010-A9B0-E91271BAEBAD.  [Course number] 70.}} of Mohammadiyeh District in Alborz County, Qazvin province, Iran.
Demographics
Population
At the time of the 2006 National Census, the village's population was 126 in 33 households. The following census in 2011 counted 91 people in 24 households. The 2016 census measured the population of the village as 87 people in 27 households. It was the most populous village in its rural district.
